properties.name: Private Landowner
properties.description:
This privately owned wooded parcel is situated between Hilltop Park and the West Penn Power property.

This property could be acquired or provide an easement in order to expand the park's trail system and provide easy access between the Trolley Line and Hilltop Park.

properties.name: Hilltop Park
properties.description:
Hilltop Park is a primarily wooded area featuring several trails, though they currently require maintenance.

Plans include expanding and enhancing the trails to ensure they are sustainable and suitable for both hiking and mountain biking.

properties.name: West Penn Power
properties.description:
Most of the proposed trail sits on this parcel, once part of the West Penn Railways trolley line. The irregularly shaped parcel extends toward Irwin along the path of the trolley line.

Owned by West Penn Power, it includes a substation and power lines. A recreational easement would be requested from West Penn Power.

properties.name: Probable Right of Way
properties.description: The West Penn Railways trolley formerly operated along this route. Westmoreland County records has no parcel recorded here, suggesting the right of way likely remains intact.

properties.name: Probable Right of Way
properties.description: The West Penn Railways trolley formerly operated along this route. Westmoreland County records has no parcel recorded here, suggesting the right of way likely remains intact.

properties.name: Private Landowner
properties.description:
This 11-acre wooded property with a small stream and rugged terrain is privately owned.

It offers a potential trailhead on Whitney Chase Lane, giving the neighborhood easy access to the trail. An easement or acquisition would be required.
